content:

author: noftus

comments.content:
It has a sharper angle, but you might be happy with [Bickham Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825072005/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0005366) with all it's swash alts.

Totally agree about the Stock.

I'd also suggest Ballantines Script as another, slightly less swashy alternative.
